bill.title: Office of Hawaiian Affairs' Portion of Income and Proceeds from the Public Trust Lands between November 7, 1978 through June 30, 2012
bill.description: Conveys Kakaako Makai lands to Office of Hawaiian Affairs, and resolves all disputes and controversies, and extinguishes, discharges and bars all claims, suits, and actions relating to OHA's portion of income and proceeds from the public trust lands for the period November 7, 1978 through June 30, 2012

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to HWN/WLH/JDL, WAM.
(S) Re-Referred to HWN/WLH, JDL/WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on HWN/WLH has scheduled a public hearing on 02-06-12 2:45PM in conference room 224.
(S) The committee(s) on HWN/WLH deferred the measure until 02-10-12 2:45PM in conference room 224.
(S) The committee on HWN/WLH has rescheduled its decision making to 02-13-12 2:45PM in conference room 224.

(S) The committee(s) on WLH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WLH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Solomon, Ryan, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Tokuda, Slom.

(S) The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HWN were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Galuteria, Ryan, English, Kahele, Kidani, Solomon; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Hee, Slom.
(S) Reported from HWN/WLH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2380) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL/WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL/WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL/WAM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-27-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL/WAM deferred the measure until 03-01-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL/WAM deferred the measure until 03-02-12 10:30AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Hee ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Kim.
(S) Reported from JDL/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2710) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 03-06-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Hee, Kim . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 306).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to WLO/HAW, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 41
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by WLO/HAW on Monday, 03-12-12 10:30AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on WLO recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Cabanilla, Coffman, Ito, Kawakami, Nakashima, Riviere, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes.

(H) The committees on HAW recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Jordan, Mizuno, Morikawa, Yamane; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Hanohano; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Wooley, Pine, Ward.
(H) Bill scheduled for reconsideration of previous decision by WLO/HAW on 03-14-12 10:00AM in conference room 329.
(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 03-12-12.

(H) The votes in WLO were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Cabanilla, Carroll, Coffman, Ito, Kawakami, Nakashima; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Herkes, Riviere, Thielen.

(H) The votes in HAW were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Hanohano, C. Lee, Jordan, Morikawa, Wooley, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Mizuno, Yamane, Pine.

(H) The committees on WLO recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Cabanilla, Carroll, Coffman, Ito, Kawakami, Nakashima; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Herkes, Riviere, Thielen.

(H) The committees on HAW recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Hanohano, C. Lee, Jordan, Morikawa, Wooley, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Mizuno, Yamane, Pine.
(H) Reported from WLO/HAW (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1025-12), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 03-20-12 2:45PM in House conference room 325.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, Kawakami, Oshiro, Tokioka excused (4).

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Carroll, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Coffman, Herkes.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1272-12), recommending referral to FIN.
(H) Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 03-29-12 1:30PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1413-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes, Manahan, Wooley excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 337).
